markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Whiptail Centipede](/Monsters.aspx?ID=581)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Whiptail centipedes are sleek and swift tunnel predators.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Whiptail Centipede](/Monsters.aspx?ID=581)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 45

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Tail only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing plus whiptail centipede venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Undulate** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant whiptail centipede Strides or Steps. During this movement, it can pass through spaces as narrow as 5 feet without [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31).

**Whiptail Centipede Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d10 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d10 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d10 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-22" />
name: Giant Whiptail Centipede
